channel.title: Geetha Marcus on Transcripts of Iriss.fm
channel.description: Recent content in Geetha Marcus on Transcripts of Iriss.fm

item.title: Geetha Marcus
item.description: GM - Geetha Marcus GM I'm Geetha Marcus and I did a study around the experiences of Gypsy Traveller girls in Scottish schools some time ago, and before I started I thought - oh, by the way, Isaac, I hope I fulfil your strong women thing because that's, you know, you can tell me later if I fit the bill! So just a little bit about my journey, who I am and how I ended up here and how I ended up talking about Gypsies and Travellers when I'm not myself a Gypsy or a Traveller, although I think there's some sort of a connection through the Indian connection, but I thought I'd start with myself.
